name: AMST498J
title: Asian American Politics
description: Cross-listed with: AAST443. Credit only granted for: AAST498T, AAST443, GVPT368C or AMST 498J. Formerly: AAST498T. Students will gain a greater understanding of 1)the role of Asian Americans in US politics, 2) the political attitudes and behaviors of Asian Americans and 3)how to conduct research on Asian American politics. Though the class will concentrate on Asian Americans, issues related to Asian American politics will be examined within the larger context of America's multicultural political landscape.
